item.name: Launcher Mode
Launcher Mode v2
item.appendix: Enable launcher mode by O key. (Remember as "O"pen apps.)
* Open "Activity Monitor" by "O down -> A down -> A up".
* Open "Mail" by "O down -> M down -> M up".
And you can open other apps by similar way.
You can also open apps by holding O+A keys down.
(You can adjust timeout by "__BlockUntilKeyUp__ Timeout" in "Key Repeat" tab.
* Search a selected text by Dictionary: O+Q key
* Open Desktop by Finder: O+F key
